page.title: 10THE PAVILION SEER GREEN
page.content: The pavilion on the recreation ground was presented to the village by the Parish Council.It was opened on 29th July 1972 by Mr.Eric Rogers.The various sports clubs-football,cricket darts fishing-which use the pavilion have formed a social association.The Sport and Leisure Association use the pavilion as a meeting place for the whole family,where they can drink,play darts,cards etc.One of the most popular annual events is the Six a Side cricket competition.This is split into the Fun League and the Serious League and attracts a variety of teams including Seer Green and Jordans Cricket Club,the Bucks Advertiser team,the School P.T.A. the Maidens,the School staff,the School boys,the School girls,the Guides,the Scouts,the Young Wives,the Playgroup Ladies and many more.
